title: Mordekaiser Could Cure Depression
body:
We know that everyone in Mitna Rachnun is bound to Mordekaiser's will, to the point where they won't even move without his order (at least sometimes). He has direct control over all of their souls, as evidenced by him turning a whole bunch of 'em into bricks.

So he could, in theory, use that power to tell them to stop being agonized over their existence. What are they going to do, disobey him? They'd have no choice but to feel whatever way he chooses to make them feel. He's not _going to_  use his power for that, but he _could._

replies.body: “I don’t _want_ to cure depression. I want to have an evil ghost army.”
I knew someone was gonna make that reference!
the worst part about Mitna Rachnun is the eternity long Emo elevator music that plays. Torment indeed.
He can literally Vibe check you if that is the case
As If he needed any more lore buffs, now he's also the vibe police. Chillstapo.

I thought this was going to be a thread about how satisfying it is to swagger up to enemies and BONK them with your Q. Seriously, Mordekaiser's animations are some of the best-feeling in the game. That alone could cure depression.
If he told them to divide into an army one billion strong with laser eyes and super strength for every soldier, would they do it?
